claim.text: Universal wayfinding uses architectural cues rather than signs: clear sight lines to the destination, distinct materials at transitions (a change in floor material at the threshold), consistent lighting that leads toward the entrance, and color contrast between walls and floors.
claim.claim: Universal wayfinding design principles include sight lines, distinct materials at transitions, consistent lighting, and color contrast
